website_summaries.verdict: A quality set that is particularly good for making YouTube videos.
pros: Adequately lights a number of different angles
Includes durable backdrops and a crossbar
cons: Backdrops are a bit thin, but this does not seem to affect photo quality

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but here's what else you'll need
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are useless. The whole thing is a deal for the money. But just be aware of these things. 1. Backdrop are Muslin is thin and so Reheat translucent; if there is any light from the wrong side, it will show through. 2. The stands are flimsy so you'll need to purchase sandbags to anchor them. 3. Get some large clamps to help pull the muslin wrinkles out and to keep the cords out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: BROOK SHUMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap stands, but it works, and it can last for a long time if you're gentle and don't over tighten them or do anything too crazy. I wouldn't bring these to an outdoor shoot. The picture makes the screens look much longer than they actually are, but they measure as described and are still a sufficient size for most cases. Great deal for the price. Slight annoyance that the counter weight bag for the boom stand didn't come with anything to put in it for weight. I suppose it's easy to get some sand from home depot or even your backyard, but I mean come on...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this kit
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for the price. If your not rushing, the entire kit is easy to assemble - just look at the pieces and the pics and they all fit together logically. It's great that this kit comes with not one, but two muslim backdrops too - including the green. I love that the light weight makes for easy transport - while I'm video taping I can easily take one light with me and it makes a world of difference when on location but not a full time pro.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it, but there are some things that could have been improved.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing kit for the price, however, there are some quality issues. The backdrops are very thin and get easily wrinkled. The boom stand is flimsy and is not at all stable. An important part of the boom stand is made of plastic and feels like it will break when you are adjusting it. The case is big but it is still very difficult to fit everything in it. Mine has started ripping at the top. Although these things can get a little annoying, I would definitely recommend this product. You will not find all of this equipment for such a good price. ($240 when I bought it.)
customer_reviews.author: V. Nayak

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit for the pricing.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad total kit for the pricing, I guess. It's just a hassle to set up. I'm still looking around for a similar kit that is easier to set up, with umbrellas that pop open, instead of having to set up each corner light prong/stick each time. It does all fit in the case, but it's also another hassle to have to take out the bulbs, and repack them in the boxes each time. Maybe there is a kit that uses less fragile LED bulbs that are as bright, with an easier setup?
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: The assembly instructions are horrible. Just one page with tiny photo with about ...
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions are horrible. Just one page with tiny photos with about 3 sentences. On 4 light head one of the off on switches broke first time, luckly it broke in the on position. There are 3 lights boxes, two with 4 bulbs and one with one big multi tube bulb which I assume was for overhead hair light that was way too bright. The back drops are horribly wrinkled so you better order a frabic steamer with it. The stands are very light weight. For the price it is ok but I doubt I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Medium quality for a moderate price
customer_reviews.text: The stands are a bit light-weight for the lights, so they are tippy unless you use the widest spread for the legs, turn the legs the right way, and don't extend the one with the boom very far. The connections to set the angle of the lights are flimsy and feel easy to strip. The three backdrops are made of very thin material and it's hard to get them smooth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruehle

customer_reviews.title: NICE LIGHTS/BACKDROP - MUST BUY CLIPS ALSO
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. Good light, even fill, not too bad construction. However ensure you weight the tripod legs down with something (sandbags, ect.) because these knock over easy. Be sure to buy clips with the backdrop, ones that have strong grip to stretch the fabric. Iron or steam once you get it and research 3 point lighting. Poles are easy to assemble, but soft boxes are a bitch. I keep them assembled when I travel. Nice travel bag. If I had to do it again... I'd do it again. Thank you ePhoto.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Brunetta

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Usable but should have splurged for a better individual items. I do use it though, but is you try to make this a portable unit your going to end up frustrated and with broken parts. I leave it in studio set up and its probably worth what I paid for that use. But I would rather have one really quality light and build a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Broken part and no phone number for Customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the light housings is missing a metal ring that holds the bulb in, so I am unable to put 4th bulb into it. There is no phone number to contact this company to address the issue. I do not feel that I should have to return an entire kit for one broken part. I just want the part that is broken replaced. I also feel that I should not have to pay for the shipping to do so since it arrived this way. I always trusted Amazon and the companies they use, but I am very disappointed with this. It otherwise looks like a decent starter studio.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Lights are really bright. You get a ton for your money here. It's not professional quality but it matches my experience level right now. It's great to have the backdrops and the system does pack away. Although packing it back into the bag will be a chore. I say pick this up without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyHudson

customer_reviews.title: Happy I took a risk on this product!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting too much for the price, so was pleasantly surprised to find an instruction sheet and really everything I needed for setting up video. In fact, because of the way it came packed up, I have kept all the bulb packages and boxes so I can transport and use it at events. carrying case makes that super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Florida beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and amount of equipment for the price! All our guests think we paid a lot more for the studio set up than we did.
customer_reviews.author: starbella

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money but backdrops are poor quality and needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: There is no doubt that this is a great deal for the money. My only complaints are that it comes with almost no instructions to assemble which will make it tough for many people to figure out and the backdrops are thin and unusable in my view. I would budget to buy thicker backdrops (or paper ones) as well - but its a great kit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great setup for anyone who is just starting out in photo/video production. You are getting this set up for an outstanding price. I would recommend this product to anyone who is on a tight budget but still wants to start up their own photography or cinematography business. If you are just starting out in YouTube, this is the setup for you to start out with.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Light Bulb arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product, arrived in torn package and damaged box. The bag inside was unzipped. The large central light bulb was broken at arrival. Considering that their product contains many lightbulbs it was inadequately packed. Edit: The company send a replacement bulb that arrived within 2 days and works. In the meantime, I worked with the system and am happy with it. The backdrop indeed needs ironing but it is made out of good material. The tripods and stands are of good enough quality and the lights are bright enough, not very hot and have the right color. Overall, I can recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quality setup makes this a no brainer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I shot a series of high production videos for my business on it. It was easy to setup and was tall enough for my 6' 4" frame to fit under. For the price, it's a quality setup.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: the set up is good but I found on of the soft box it ...
customer_reviews.text: the set up is good but I found on of the soft box it dosent match with the lights
customer_reviews.author: Nidal Ataya

customer_reviews.title: i would make it better if i took time on it
customer_reviews.text: just go head and buy it if you want keying work. i attached one photo just i did very quick without any difficulties. simply , laid the green material down on the floor and took photo. i did it in few sconds. i would make it better if i took time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman M Alzahrani

customer_reviews.title: Very short term product. Plastic lamp housings melted after ...
customer_reviews.text: Very short term product. Plastic lamp housings melted after long hours of use. Black backdrop to porous for use in some lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: Farshid Farrokhnia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but very workable light kit
customer_reviews.text: Not the best build quality, but if you are not moving it around much it's quite suitable for some awesome photos! My setup just rests in the basement. The fill light on the backdrop doesn't always give complete coverage, but it's definitely workable. With everything you get this light kit is a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary SO Lough

customer_reviews.title: The box didn't include one of the big frames that ...
customer_reviews.text: The box didn't include one of the big frames that go around the lightbox and there was no way to get them to send a replacement./
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... years ago and so far it hasn't been the best, but for the money its ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit 2 years ago and so far it hasn't been the best, but for the money its ok. Ive had some issues with it, the stands are pretty flimsy, one light fixture broke and I can no longer turn one switch off, and i have to unplug it to turn off, and the backdrops are very thin and come heavily creased. I have contacted the company about the broken fixture to see if i can get a replacement part as I am 1 1/2 months out of the warranty and i hope they will help me find one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: What a great kit! Everything you need to do professional looking green screen work. Everything arrived intact. Needed a little help from YouTube to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set-up. No set-up instructions for the boom -- but youtube made that easy enough. Very pleased with the quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: You will not find a better kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this kit is incredible. The softboxes function professionally and are sturdy, although be sure to ground the hairlight. The greenscreen support works perfectly. The only minor complaint I have is that the fabric material is lighter than I expected, you will get wrinkles in it, though if you're lit well (and you will be) they won't be noticeable. You could also try ironing the wrinkles out. This kit isn't very mobile, but its perfect for a static setup. Look no further if you're a vlogger on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product and it is a great price! I highly recommend this product and the vendor. It arrived on time and it was nicely packaged for safe arrival. It was easy to set up as well. It is a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: hokie fan

customer_reviews.title: Simply put... A very affordable setup!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly new to doing green screen photography but wanted my own setup. This one had the price, the equipment and the features I needed. And all enclosed in a zippered duffel bag for easy transport. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Everything was well packaged and in tact when I received it. My only gripe is that the instructions are a little scanty. Although, as another reviewer said, it is pretty intuitive to assemble, there were no instructions for the boom light and I wasted some time figuring it out. The product itself is perfect for my use; I would have given it 5 stars were it not for the inadequate instructions.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous 6

customer_reviews.title: backdrops very thin can see thru them no good to use with green screen wizard image of what ...
customer_reviews.text: backdrops very thin can see thru them no good to use with green screen wizard image of what ever is behind screen shows on image
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: the product seems great, came very quickly but, it didnt come with directions..and when you call them to get what you need their customer service is not very inviting. The directions were emailed to me but they are not entirely accurate so id give them 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Garret White

customer_reviews.title: Cheap... made in china... ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap...made in china....2 light sockets stripped out from factory. Yay. Back drop as thin as lingerie.
customer_reviews.author: elderjay

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 4 because there was no instructions and for someone new to this, it was difficult figuring it out. Has to watch instructions via YouTube...once I found one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.text: Super simple set-up and tear-down. I'll have to figure out a way to safely transport the bulbs over time. I almost bought another kit that used the same image but had a shorter backdrop. This has the long one.
customer_reviews.author: XONIKZ

customer_reviews.title: It's aight... I guess honey!
customer_reviews.text: The product works for the most part. The carrying bag is cheaply made. The directions are barely helpful. The boxes for the parts came in damaged as if it was used. The poles are aluminum. They do the job but you can't really do much with it. Its a starter kit. Its enough to get your feet off the ground but I recommend you invest in higher quality equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Tuitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great package. Check out samples of the photos at elleluxx.com
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good deal. Very good quality fabric. Lights are bright and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Bagged ripped when I went to use zipper
customer_reviews.text: The carrying bag ripped the first time I went to zip it back up after a shoot, Now I have to carry multiple bags if I want to use this equipment. I thought from other reviews I would be happy with the purchase, but sadly I am not.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Gell

customer_reviews.title: basic Quick start guide is useless. Product is advertised as 10x12 but it only ...
customer_reviews.text: Product does not come with any setup instructions. basic Quick start guide is useless. Product is advertised as 10x12 but it only goes to 8ft height. Company never replies and when you call ephoto all you get is an automated message stating no one is available please call again later. I have been trying to call since December.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: It's 'portable' but not really made for easy set up and tear down
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as an affordable green screen set.. Can also double as a basic set up for on camera interviews/testimonials. Gets the job done for the price. It's 'portable' but not really made for easy set up and tear down. Handle with kid gloves and it will last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Good value, missing screws
customer_reviews.text: A couple missing screws, but otherwise well worth what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Dearringer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I Love it.. cant wait to start taking pictures!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: praytor98

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the order
customer_reviews.text: All around a solid buy. Screen is thin and I may have to get new ones. Lights are very blue shaded and the instructions are crude, but the product is a great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: michael henderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for beginners or those on a tight budget
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to start making more professional looking psa videos for the non-profit I work for. Assembly can take about a half hour+. I recommend using sand bags to stabilize the backdrop support, and at the footing of the hair light , if not it can wobble quite a bit. When I received the kit there was an issue with one of the soft-boxes, I contacted the seller and within 3 days a replacement part was at my doorstep.. Quality kit for beginners or if you are on a tight budget, and a quality seller with great support.
customer_reviews.author: jpyarger

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a good light for the cost. It was kinda difficult to set up and came with no instruction. Also I would recommend you get another carrying bag. The big is very cheaply made, mine came ripped because it was packed with so much stuff. But for the cost, you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Young

customer_reviews.title: Good for what i need
customer_reviews.text: Product works well in small room areas.. Down side is over head light did not work and the hours customers service is available but when I reached out to them I got a quick response and replacement part with no issues. other than that 4 stars in my book
customer_reviews.author: Jay Roc

customer_reviews.title: the only good thing about it are the backdrops
customer_reviews.text: this is a piece of junk...none of the light stands work or even hold a light...the only good thing about it are the backdrops.
customer_reviews.author: JHintz

customer_reviews.title: Fabric could be a little thicker so that light doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabric could be a little thicker so that light doesn't show through from the back side. I corrected this on my own by adding another layer of fabric behind, but I really should have to do that if it worked correctly.
customer_reviews.author: gtanya33

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great for starting out, The only issure i found was setting up the boom Light. It felt a bit flimsy and felt and one point almost broke. but the other lights were just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Averill Leano

customer_reviews.title: GREAT option for the $
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at the backdrops are larger than I expected, but I have the room for it so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wakeman

customer_reviews.title: Lighting
customer_reviews.text: This ska great kit I would recommend it to anyone. The only thing is that you will need to iron the muslin every time. And buy some clips to stretch it so it looks nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon ramos

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions not very good and missing instructions for some items
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions not very good and missing instructions for some items. Product is not bad for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!! i was suprised
customer_reviews.text: the 1st time i ordered it i was missing 1/2 the items! Amazon shipped out the other FAST!!! this is a pretty sturdy unit, however i would make your own sandbags for all stands. any PRO that needs light, this will enhance your needs! this is as advanced as YOU make it! lighting is fine indoors. get creative with it
customer_reviews.author: Heath R.

customer_reviews.title: but the price its great for a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Low quality and flimsy when you open up the stands far out. but the price its great for a starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: THE PHOTO DOESN"T REPRESENT THE ACTUAL PRODUCT AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it was okay. one of my lights had a hole in it. It had no kind of warranty and it's kind of flimsy and the hair light is kind of off center
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Void Unless You Really Enjoy Puzzles!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this! The thing does not come with instruction just a whole lot of parts! I have no way of knowing if I have the right amount of parts and I am faced with trying to put this thing together via trial and error and a picture from the website! This sucks!
customer_reviews.author: XPOW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set up! Simple and easy to set up. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No instructions how to connect and my big light burned out it literally 19 seconds of being on
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and put away. Lots of products for the price. Used it several times and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn colon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a great kit. Im happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J Fullen

customer_reviews.title: it was good staff to use except one thing which upset me
customer_reviews.text: it was good staff to use except one thing which upset me, i founf one of the stands' leg was broken :/
customer_reviews.author: Fahad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Screen is a little bigger than I need but great quality for a low price! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran K Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It can pass as professional, not top quality but has the same look as professional the lights definitely. just ironed the sheets and worked perfectly as needed like i said it looks professional placed all together decent materials and i must say it was worth my time and money. I guess i was a lucky one, I had all the parts, easy for me to place and i know how to shoot and edit works 100 % well. nothing more nothing less
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lara

customer_reviews.title: good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter kit for someone who is looking for a portable studio. The backdrops aren't muslin, and show wrinkles, you can iron or steam the creases out. The stands are metal, but the majority of the hardware is plastic. So when it come to tightening be careful they do break or strip out. You can get replacement thumb bolt from a hardware store to replace the plastic ones. need to add some type of weight to the boom light, it comes with a bag for sand, but leg weights work well. All in all it's worth the price to get started in photography or videography.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Small broken part upon arrival, they sent new part right away. Very pleased with customer service. The product is as pictured. It is not the sturdiest ever, but it is exactly what I expected at this bargin price. Should do just fine if care is used when packing and unpacking. Can't wait to start making short comedy films.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Change from the distracting backgrounds
customer_reviews.text: Tired of all teh clutter in backgrounds. Looking for a more professional means of taking individual and group photos. Appreciate the quality and compact features.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace Lont

customer_reviews.title: But overall for the price not bad.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you get what you pay for, my only issue with my purchase was some of the legs arrived broken, The lights and backdrops were a descent quality and the bag that the parts came in make it convenient to store and keep it all together. I would suggest buying your photography equipment to last, this may be ok for someone who wouldn't move it around much. But overall for the price not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Omora A. Eccleston

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother if in a hurry. Otherwise, take time to check accuracy of contents before assembling.
customer_reviews.text: Kit was incomplete and had a defective part. Needs packing list so customers can check accuracy of items before putting together, then having to take down to return. Not a bad kit, but, check items before assembling. Only option is to send back if missing or defective products.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: excelent!
customer_reviews.text: Backdrops are of a very good quality, i thought they would be very thin and see through like ones i saw on youtube but on the contrary they are heavy except the white one wich is a bit thiner than the other 2 but over all its all excelent. the stands are great, light bulbs arrived intact. Definetly a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadna Bila

customer_reviews.title: Time and Parts
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit and cant complain because it is just a cheap intro light kit. just have rating as a 2 because feel that for the money some of the parts should be metel and not plastic. Also I had to file 2 separate claims because some light bulbs where broken when delivered and a part was missing (wasted my time) Especially for those who pay more for better shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mike1415

customer_reviews.title: Giant solo Bulb broken
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the giant single bulb came broken. ..it won't turn on...please contact me to send me another one to get better ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad that one of the lamps that brings a focus on, I opened it and to have a screw to squeeze one of the cables, which made me lose a lot of time to fix, most of the parties are not very fine paste and the curtain leaves many wrinkles. I recommend placing an instruction manual to assemble the different parts, really do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Duque

customer_reviews.title: Great Started set, quality parts for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Started set, quality parts for the price. Not professionally sturdy as you would expect in this price range, Cloth material is nice and heavy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Don

product_meta.title: ePhoto Professional Photography Video Chromakey 10x12 Ft Green White Black Muslin Backdrop Support Kit & Softbox Hair light Boom Stand Kit by ePhotoInc H9004SB-1012BWG
product_meta.description:
This studio portrait video lighting Kit is easy to use and setup. These lights work great with digital DSLR cameras. It is ideal for all level photographers. It is a complete continuous lighting system, background support stands and muslin backdrops for your to set up your studio. You could use them in the studio photography or videography as well as on location projects. This lighting kit is the most affordable kit on the market today. IT is compatible with any camera on the market today like Nikon, Canon, Sony, Olympus and more. 

This Lighting Kit Includes 

1 x Background stand 8ft height 10ft wide 4 sections 
2 x 16x24" soft boxes for 4-socket 
2 x 4-socket lamp 
8 x 45W bulb 5500K 
2 x 7ft light stand 
1 x 6.5ft boom stand 
1 x 16" EZ softbox 
1 x 105W bulb 5500K 
1 x crossbar, sandbag 
1 x 10x12' white backdrop 
1 x 10x12' black backdrop 
1 x 10x12' green backdrop 
1 x Carrying Case
feature_bullets: Ideal for portraits, studio, photography and video
Easy to control your lights with ON/OFF switch.
Set up in minutes to offer you a professional result.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars123 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
